snippet: A promising junior, Andy Fitzpatrick has been forced to put his career on hold on several occasions for financial reasons. Now he earns a living as part of Sloane Stephens’s team.
abstract: A promising junior, Andy Fitzpatrick has been forced to put his career on hold on several occasions for financial reasons. Now he earns a living as part of Sloane Stephens’s team.

headline.main: British Player Finds a Home as Stephens's Hitting Partner
